ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
glib:
- '2'
gsl:
- '2.7'
gstreamer:
- '1.26'
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64
zlib:
- '1'

about.description:
This package provides a variety of gstreamer elements for
gravitational-wave data analysis and some libraries to help write such
elements.  The code here sits on top of several other libraries, notably
the LIGO Algorithm Library (LAL), FFTW, the GNU Scientific Library (GSL),
and, of course, GStreamer.
This package contains plugins, libraries, and programs for inspiral data
analysis.
about.summary: GStreamer for GW data analysis (inspiral parts)

name: gstlal-inspiral

about.description:
This package provides a variety of gstreamer elements for
gravitational-wave data analysis and some libraries to help write such
elements.  The code here sits on top of several other libraries, notably
the LIGO Algorithm Library (LAL), FFTW, the GNU Scientific Library (GSL),
and, of course, GStreamer.
This package contains plugins, libraries, and programs for inspiral data
analysis.
about.summary: GStreamer for GW data analysis (inspiral parts)

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: gstlal-inspiral
  version: 1.11.0
  # dependencies
  gobject_introspection_version: 1.30.0
  gstlal_version: 1.10.0
  gstlal_ugly_version: 1.10.0
  lal_version: 7.2.4
  lalinspiral_version: 3.0.2
  lalmetaio_version: 3.0.2
  ligo_gracedb_version: 2.7.5
  ligo_scald_version: 0.8.1
  ligo_segments_version: 1.2.0
  python_ligo_lw_version: 1.8.0

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://software.igwn.org/sources/source/${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: c5e1b167bfb118ae2fcc0355108997ad4425774292a7d33a727a1b8ebe55d338
  patches:
    - py-compile-imp.patch
    - pyobject_head_init.patch
    - link-gsl.patch
    - if: osx
      then: no-link-libpython.patch

build:
  number: 4
  skip:
    - win
    # gstlal not built for Python 3.13
    - match(python, ">=3.13")

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - make
    - pkg-config >=0.18.0
  host:
    - glib
    - gobject-introspection >=${{ gobject_introspection_version }}
    - gsl
    - gstreamer
    - gstlal >=${{ gstlal_version }}
    - liblal >=${{ lal_version }}
    - liblalinspiral >=${{ lalinspiral_version }}
    - liblalmetaio >=${{ lalmetaio_version }}
    - numpy 1.*
    - python
    - zlib
  run:
    - gobject-introspection >=${{ gobject_introspection_version }}
    - gsl
    - gstreamer
    - gst-plugins-base
    - gstlal >=${{ gstlal_version }}
    - gstlal-ugly >=${{ gstlal_ugly_version }}
    - h5py
    - liblal >=${{ lal_version }}
    - liblalinspiral >=${{ lalinspiral_version }}
    - liblalmetaio >=${{ lalmetaio_version }}
    - ligo-gracedb >=${{ ligo_gracedb_version }}
    - ligo-segments >=${{ ligo_segments_version }}
    - ligo-scald >=${{ ligo_scald_version }}
    - ${{ pin_compatible('numpy') }}
    - pandas >=0.17.1
    - python
    - python-lal >=${{ lal_version }}
    - python-lalinspiral >=${{ lalinspiral_version }}
    - python-ligo-lw >=${{ python_ligo_lw_version }}
    - scipy
  ignore_run_exports:
    by_name:
      - liblalmetaio
      - liblalinspiral
      - gst-plugins-base
      - gobject-introspection
      - libzlib
    from_package:
      - ${{ compiler('c') }}

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - gstlal.chirptime
        - gstlal.far
        - gstlal.snglinspiraltable
  - script:
      - export GSTLAL_FIR_WHITEN=0
      - "export TMPDIR=$(python -c \"import tempfile; print(tempfile.gettempdir())\")"
      - "python -c \"import gstlal.inspiral\""
      - gstlal_inspiral --help
      - gstlal_inspiral_workflow --help
      - gstlal_inspiral_svd_bank --help
      - gstlal_ll_inspiral_workflow --help

about:
  summary: GStreamer for GW data analysis (inspiral parts)
  description: |
    This package provides a variety of gstreamer elements for
    gravitational-wave data analysis and some libraries to help write such
    elements.  The code here sits on top of several other libraries, notably
    the LIGO Algorithm Library (LAL), FFTW, the GNU Scientific Library (GSL),
    and, of course, GStreamer.
    This package contains plugins, libraries, and programs for inspiral data
    analysis.
  homepage: https://lscsoft.docs.ligo.org/gstlal/
  repository: https://git.ligo.org/lscsoft/gstlal/
  documentation: https://lscsoft.docs.ligo.org/gstlal/
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  license_file: COPYING

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - aepace
    - duncanmmacleod
    - nothisisolivia
